about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: JUAN JOSÉ AGUDELO VÉLEZ
about.description: I am a passionate software development professional with a solid foundation in Software Analysis, Development, and Computer Engineering. I have practical experience in Full Stack Development and have worked on diverse projects, ranging from web applications to inventory and billing systems. I am characterized by my problem-solving skills, continuous learning mindset, and adaptability to new challenges.
